      • getWordLengthCount

        public int[] getWordLengthCount()
        Specified by:
        getWordLengthCount in interface FleschStatisticsInterface
        Returns:
        the wordLengthCount array with locations [0]..[23] with location [i] storing the number of words of length i in the text file. Location [0] is not used. Location [23] holds the count of words of length 23 and higher.

      • getSyllablePerWordCount

        public int[] getSyllablePerWordCount()
        Specified by:
        getSyllablePerWordCount in interface FleschStatisticsInterface
        Returns:
        the syllableCount array with locations [0]..[15] with location [i] storing the number words with a particular syllable count in the text file. Location [0] is not used. Location [15] holds the count of words with syllables count greater than 15.

      • getFleschIndex

        public double getFleschIndex()
        Specified by:
        getFleschIndex in interface FleschStatisticsInterface
        Returns:
        the calculated Flesch index

      • getFleschGrade

        public java.lang.String getFleschGrade()
        Specified by:
        getFleschGrade in interface FleschStatisticsInterface
        Returns:
        the Flesch grade level associated with the Flesch index
